about_the_game:
Escape from Horn head
A game "find a way out of the room"-like, for those who love the horror genre. You are being chased by a Hornhead. You need to find the keys and potions before he catches up with you.
The oppressive atmosphere is conveyed through the gloomy soundtrack, the dark and mysterious interior of the old mansion and the constant feeling that you are being watched.
Some keys will be hanging in the most visible place, and some are hidden better. Explore the rooms, look for objects and avoid the pursuer. Try to find the best way, remember the movement of the Horned-headed demon chasing its victim, that is, you.
